926660.name: Real-time Tactical 2D
926660.description:
Welcome, Commander. We need your help! Earth Republic is again at danger! Defend our positions - this time in 2D!

This Early Access DLC includes one mission and complete DLC product will include 6 levels. Graphical style is different than in base game, since this is 2D styled game.

HOW TO ACCESS REAL-TIME TACTICAL 2D?


Currently you cannot access this 2D-game directly from RTS Commander launcher. This feature will be added after update to the main game. In order to access this DLC content, go to game install folder (Smash the rebels) and launch Real-Time Tactical 2D .exe file. Have fun!
926660.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
